data.title: Joe McStravick: Movies, TV, and Bio
data.meta_description: Browse Joe McStravick movies and TV shows available on Prime Video and begin streaming right away to your favorite device.
data.text:
Joe McStravick is an award-winning Film & Television Director. A number of his past projects have been commissioned by and/or broadcast by Northern Ireland Screen, BFI, RTE, TG4 and BBC. His previous short films have screened at a number of international film festivals, in addition to a number Academy Award accredited and BAFTA accredited film festivals.

He has also directed & produced a range of multi-platform commercials, documentaries and films for Randox, Cable & Wireless Worldwide, PwC, HM Treasury, BBC and a number of other international companies and clients.
